about_the_game:
You are the commander of a newly constructed state of art Dreadnought. You have been heavily damaged in recent battles. Your weapon systems are offline, your engines are non functional, your jump drive is inoperable and the enemy is approaching.

Your only option is to scout for resources in the nearby asteroid fields, repair the ship's jump drive and get to the nearest fortress world.

Can you survive the onslaught? Will you make it to the fortress world? or will you perish?

Dreadnought is a mix of Action Tower Defense Survival and Shoot 'Em Up Bullet Hell with light Rogue lite elements where you control the ships turrets and defend against waves of enemies until you can jump to safety.

Unlock new weapons, install different modules, upgrade your ship. Scout and collect enough resources to repair the jump drive.

Features

  • Loadout Customization: Upgrade and customize your arsenal as you unlock new items to take down the hordes!
  • Dynamic Builds: Diverse array of weapons and modules to choose from throughout a run, no two attempts will ever be the same
  • Unrelenting Onslaught: Combat an endless stream of enemies.
  • Scout and Collect: Use an array of drones to scout and collect nearby resources.
  • Permanent upgrade System: Enhance your hull, armor and shields and carry progression across all runs
  • Precise Control: Directional aim and active firing delivers a methodical battle system
  • Diverse Cast & Arsenal: Experiment with builds across a range of unlockable weapons and modules
  • Pick Up And Play: Approachable 10-30 minute runs built with quick play sessions in mind

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Mow down the alien hordes, scout for resources and survive. Dreadnought is a mix of Action Tower Defense Survival and Shoot 'Em Up Bullet Hell where you control the ships turrets & defend against waves of enemies. Choose your weapons, upgrade your ship & brace yourself, the horde is coming.
